class.name: BlockInnerCholesky

javadoc.text: Performs a cholesky decomposition on an individual inner block.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.text: Performs an inline upper Cholesky decomposition on an inner row-major matrix. Only * the upper triangular portion of the matrix is read or written to.
javadoc.param: T Array containing an inner row-major matrix. Modified.
indexT First index of the inner row-major matrix.
n Number of rows and columns of the matrix.

javadoc.text: Performs an inline lower Cholesky decomposition on an inner row-major matrix. Only * the lower triangular portion of the matrix is read or written to.
javadoc.param: T Array containing an inner row-major matrix. Modified.
indexT First index of the inner row-major matrix.
n Number of rows and columns of the matrix.
